Text: Does this have any of the Special Features ?
Nope.
in the torrent info it says "English commentary",what's that ?

It's a commentary...
Some of the episodes have the writers, directors etc talk a bit in some scenes.

Is there a way to not play the commentary then? Is it a separate audio track? It would be pretty annoying to have them talking over the show when I want to watch it, but having a SD version of the episodes with the commentary would be nice.
It's pretty obvious it's another track. Who would put it as the only track? Besides the fact that it's another codec which would suggest it's another track.
Yeah sorry I wasn't really thinking when I typed the comment.
SEED please :)
Many thanks. You are just great

"ESIR" ? 
That's really the internal release ?
Please seed.. :-)

Because at first you only have the magnet link which doesn't contain info on what is inside. 
The clients will change in time to fix this problem.

Thanks a lot, a really AWESOME upload!  It didn't work in my mediaplayer and my computer was almost dying when playing this. lol!

I have only dowloaded one episode so I could check, it seems that my hardware are inadequate. 

(for those who want more info) mediainfo says:

Writing library: libebml v1.2.3 + libmatroska v1.3.0

Video: 1920x1080p, 23.976 fps
Format profile:                 High 10@L4.1
Format settings, ReFrames: 4 frames
Muxing mode:                   Header stripping
Codec ID:                         V_MPEG4/ISO/AVC
Bit rate:                           9 538 Kbps
Overall bit rate:               11.3 Mbps
Color space:                     YUV
Chroma subsampling:        4:2:0
Bit depth:                        10 bits
Bits/(Pixel*Frame):             0.192

Audio:
DTS: CBR, 6ch, 24bit/48Khz, 1 510 Kbps 

Subtitles: 13 European, as mentioned by the uploader. Not SDH.

A fine release. I love it!

V: 10
A: 9

As to be expected, the quality is fantastic. Thanks uploader...was going nuts looking for a version this beautiful.

On another note, does anyone know if there's a way for translations to show but not the entire subtitle track?
Quality is fantastic!? you got to be joking, its full of graphical bugs and a bright pink mist at the bottom of most of the files, any comment?

My hdi dune is even capable of playing 12bit so i don't get it why this is not working on it since it's only 10bit! Anyone ?
Those bits refer to output capabilities, not decoding. It can only decode 8 bit.

For the upper, Tnx! But you should've squeezed it a little bit to reduce the file size. (Purpose of 10-bit x264 is higher compression w/o compromising the video quality)
